start() - Method in class gov.nist.timestampingauthority.TimeStampingAuthorityServer
Connect the socket to the port if not done previously, start clock synchronization, start a separate thread for getting aggregate time and responding to events in the queue, start another thread for receiving events and adding them to the queue.

stopAndWrite() - Static method in class gov.nist.timestampingauthority.Client
Stop client, both input thread and request thread are stopped, each time stamps from the server is logged and saved into the file NAME-millisecondsFrom1970.txt.
